MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY16 postcode area of St Andrews. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4pm to repair electrical equipment at Pipelands Langshaw and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.59pm on Tuesday 16th March 2021.
